Hello World!

28 February 2016 on thoughts.

I have returned to the world of blogging…

It has been a very long time since I have written a blog and I have never been consistant. My blogging past starts back in 2006, when I wrote Drupal is Changing my Life…

What is bringing me back to blogging today is my love of technology, and the want to expose folks to what is new and exciting in my world. A quick preview of where this blog is likely to go is : modern Javascript, Node.js, React.js and anything else that I am excited about…
